data.title: VerifyBamID2
data.description: VerifyBamID2: A robust tool for DNA contamination estimation from sequence reads using ancestry-agnostic method.
data.name: VerifyBamID

evidence: README install command: "conda install -c bioconda verifybamid2"

"Motivation: Detecting and estimating inter-sample DNA contamination became a crucial quality assessment step... Hence we propose this ancestry-agnostic DNA contamination estimation method." (domain-specific analysis tool users run on BAM/CRAM files)
Usage examples invoke a binary: "$(VERIFY_BAM_ID_HOME)/bin/VerifyBamID --BamFile [/path/to/bam/or/cram/file] ..." indicating an end-user application rather than a library.
